title: Delegation of Taliban Political Office meets Pakistan’s envoy in Doha Qatar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 3 (APP): A delegation of the Taliban’s Political Office arrived at Pakistan’s embassy in Doha Qatar Friday and held a meeting with the ambassador Syed Ahsan Raza Shah.
Head of Taliban’s Political Office Sher Mohammad Abbas Stanikzai was leading the delegation which held detailed talks with the Pakistani envoy.
The ambassador also hosted a dinner in honour of the visiting delegation.
The Taliban Political Office head in a flurry of activity had already held meetings with ambassadors of India, Germany and others in the past few days.
